PERSONA:
manuel garcia is a 68-year-old cuban-american man living in a metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. he was born and raised in the united states by cuban immigrant parents. manuel is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and identifies as a white hispanic.

manuel is a devout roman catholic, attending religious services once or twice a month. while he is not an evangelical or born-again christian, his faith is an important part of his life and worldview. politically, manuel aligns himself with the republican party and holds conservative views on most issues.

manuel and his wife are financially secure, with a family income exceeding $100,000 per year. this places them in the upper-income tier. despite his age, manuel is tech-savvy and uses the internet several times a day for various purposes.

in addition to his professional career, manuel is an active volunteer in his community. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duties seriously, always ensuring he is registered at his current address.

overall, manuel is a well-educated, financially stable, and civically engaged individual with strong ties to his cuban heritage and catholic faith. his conservative political leanings and active lifestyle reflect his values and priorities as he navigates his retirement years.
